title: Time to Be Bold: Labour Party Special
itunes:title: Time to Be Bold: Labour Party Special
description:
In our special programme ahead of Labour's party conference, former minister Lord Rooker says Keir Starmer needs to be bold. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker the party can't win with only the Labour tribe - it needs to form a progressive alliance.

Dr Karl Pike, lecturer in British Politics and Public Policy at Queen Mary University of London, analyses the way forward for Labour. He says there's growing confidence among Starmer's team that he can win votes in the party.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
